data.title: INFOSECGIRLS MEETUP IN BANGALORE ON FEBRUARY 29TH 2020
data.content: We are really glad to announce the InfosecGirls Bangalore Chapter || 29 Feb 2020   Speakers and Topic Info: • Aakriti Arya • Avinash Seth   Workshop Details We covered the following topics in the workshop 1) What is threat intelligence?2) Types of Threat Intelligence 3) Examples of each 4) Why Threat Intelligence is important 5) Pyramid of Pain 6) Handling the threat intelligence   Time: 10 am to 2 pm (IST)
